snippet: Shortstop Ruben Tejada, who sat out the Mets’ loss to the Cardinals on Sunday, was expected to rest until Tuesday as a precaution.
abstract: New York Mets shortstop Ruben Tejada is scratched from lineup due to tight hamstring before 7-1 loss to the St Louis Cardinals; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Shortstop Ruben Tejada, who sat out the Mets’ loss to the Cardinals on Sunday, was expected to rest until Tuesday as a precaution.

headline.main: Mets’ Tejada Has Tightness in Hamstring
headline.print_headline: Mets’ Tejada Has Tightness in Hamstring
